item.title: How to read a paper
item.description: How to read a paper # Note: This is my own digest of [1] and is kept as a reference for future readings. Problem: The author presents the problem of students having difficulty reading research papers. Contribution: The author presents the “three-pass” approach. Three-pass approach # Pass 1 Do the following: Read title, abstract and introduction. Read section and sub-sections headings. Read conclusion. To understand the “five-Cs”:
